Posts.Content: I just had my 2nd masectomy two weeks ago. Now it's in 11 of my 13 lymph nodes. Has anyone had it go into lymph nodes? Did they do chemo or radiation after?
Posts.Title: 2nd masectomy, 2weeks ago

Posts.Content: I'm glad you are doing well. I am getting tired of having to do this all over again. Thanks.
Posts.Title: 2nd masectomy, 2weeks ago

Posts.Content: thanks for replying to my message. Sorry to hear that you still have some cells. That stuff is nasty. Hugs
